list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: protected from or not exposed to danger or risk; not likely to be harmed or lost.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: eggs remain in the damp sand, safe from marine predators
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trứng vẫn còn trong cát ẩm, an toàn từ những kẻ săn mồi biển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: based on good reasons or evidence and not likely to be proved wrong.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the verdict is safe and satisfactory
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phán quyết là an toàn và thỏa đáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they had returned safe and sound
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã trở lại an toàn và âm thanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a strong fireproof cabinet with a complex lock, used for the storage of valuables.
